title: Dr Harriet B. Drage
text:
Value-driven leader, open science advocate, fan of fossils.

Postdoctoral Researcher at the University of Lausanne, working on the palaeoecology of arthropods in deep time. Previously a Commissioning Editor for science in secondary education (age 11-18) for Oxford University Press. Enjoys climbing, hiking, weightlifting, video games, and sewing in her spare time.
University of Oxford | Oxford, UK PhD in Environmental Research | Oct 2014 - Dec 2018
University College London | London, UK MSci in Palaeobiology | Oct 2010 - Oct 2014
